Maui Linux

Maui Linux is an Ubuntu/KDE Neon based GNU/Linux distribution offering latest and greatest KDE Plasma experience. The main motive behind Maui Linux is to provide a complete operating system to all kind of operating system to serve their day-to-day needs. To achieve this goal, Maui Linux ships a fairly customized version of KDE Plasma desktop with a smartly chosen set of applications.

Home Page https://mauilinux.org
Desktop Environments KDE Plasma
